alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton; Lycoming; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 11:59PM EDT until July 14 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... West central Union County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1159 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kettle Creek State Park to Monument to Centre Hall, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Jersey Shore, Carroll, Lamar, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Renovo, Castanea, Millheim and Blanchard. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Bellefonte and Mile Run exits, specifically from mile markers 167 to 195. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
